body_html:
Yeah, I think it should block 0.4.

It seems like that when the behavior of zero-dim arrays and NumPy scalars differ, we should prefer behaving like scalars, since people have more experience with them.

body:
Yeah, I think it should block 0.4.

It seems like that when the behavior of zero-dim arrays and NumPy scalars differ, we should prefer behaving like scalars, since people have more experience with them.
